name: HexJumper
description:
! This game needs Game Pad !

<<Team Name >>

Pudding Factory

<<Gameplay Instructions>>

This is jump action game. Press the button when you want to start jumping and upside down the terrain. When the fall and the terrain rise timing overlap, it jumps automatically in the player's face direction.

<<Controller>>

  • Stick: Decide player direction.
  • Buttons: Jump Or Inverse Terrain.
  • Esc: quit game.
